document.full_text: china stormed back to post a hefty trade surplus in april as exports hit a record while imports eased more than expected, weighed down by sustained monetary tightening and high commodity prices.
document.title: china trade surplus surges, fuel for yuan critics in u.s. talks
lines_and_colors: china stormed back to post a hefty trade surplus in april as exports hit a record while imports eased more than expected, weighed down by sustained monetary tightening and high commodity prices.
